LanguageData.SyrLightRadius_innerLightTooltip: Displays the radius at which the light level is sufficient to not be considered "dark" (>25%).
LanguageData.SyrLightRadius_outerLightTooltip: Displays the radius at which there is any light from the light source (>0%).
LanguageData.SyrLightRadius_WallLightRadiusTooltip: Select the same radius you entered for the wall light radius mod (default: 8)
